```{r}
library(dplyr)

#Hurricane data
hurricane_data=read.csv("Historical_Tropical_Storm_Tracks.csv", header=TRUE)
hurricane_data[!complete.cases(hurricane_data),]
hurricane<-na.omit(hurricane_data)
hurricane<-subset(hurricane, select= -c(NAME, BTID, AD_TIME))
dim(hurricane)
head(hurricane)
names(hurricane)
summary(hurricane)

#Surface temperature deviation data
temp_data=read.csv("ZonAnn.csv", header=TRUE)
temp_data[!complete.cases(temp_data),]
temperature<-na.omit(temp_data)
dim(temperature)
head(temperature)
names(temperature)
summary(temperature)

#CO2 emission data
co2_data=read.csv("CO2.csv", header=TRUE)
co2_data[!complete.cases(co2_data),]
co2<-na.omit(co2_data)
dim(co2)
head(co2)
names(co2)
summary(co2)
```
